```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,message=FALSE)
```

## Loading Library
```{r library}
library(horizon)
```

## Loading the data
```{r loading}
r <- getData('alt', country='Austria')
plot(r,main="Altitude map of Austria")
print(r)

```

## Calculating the SVF

```{r calculations}
s <- svf(r, nAngles=16, maxDist=500, ll=TRUE)

print(s)
```

## Plotting routine

```{r plotting}
plot(s,main="SVF for Austria")
```
